#################################################

About the game:

Embark on a great adventure in The Legend of Crystal Valley, where your most powerful weapon is your mind! When Eve receives a mysterious and disturbing letter from her long-estranged father, she travels to the family estate in France in order to find him. After arriving, she discovers that her father has disappeared. Now, Eve must explore Crystal Valley, an alternate fantasy world inhabited by strange creatures, and piece together the clues that reveal her family's true identity. Featuring 200 items and item combinations, 40 key characters, and eight full-length chapters, The Legend of Crystal Valley is a unique and beautiful puzzle game!
